on reading compounds: 礼【レイ】thanks, gratitude, manners, etiquette, bow, reward, gift, ceremony, ritual
礼拝【レイハイ】worship (esp. Christian), adoration, divine service, worship (esp. Buddhist and Shinto)
礼賛【ライサン】praise, worship, adoration, glorification
頂礼【チョウライ】prostration, placing knees, hands and forehead on the ground to show utmost respect
室礼【シツライ】setting up a living or ceremonial space with furnishings, implements, etc. (Heian era)
